text:
The class coyote.ajp.Constants contains 3 public static non-empty String[] arrays:

methodTransArray
responseTransArray
headerTransArray

responseTransArray only appears to be locally, so could be made private.

The others are used in index lookups, so get(index) methods could be used to protect them.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: We can protect these by converting to enums, but the lookup is about 3 times slower (although .005ns vs 0.014ns is splitting hairs ;).
creator: timw@apache.org
timw@apache.org
text:
Fixed in trunk by protecting the lookups with static final getters.
Slowdown is negligible on a micro-benchmark with 1 billion executions, so there should be no performance hit.
Thanks! Useful to know that the getter method is efficient.
creator: sebb@apache.org
